blocks.name: fimaxre
blocks.content: A finite set of real numbers has a maximum. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Proof shortened by Steven Nguyen, 3-Jun-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm fimaxre(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  mpd(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))))
  syl3an1(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))), wor(clt, c0))
  mpi(wss(c0, cr), wor(clt, c0), wor(clt, cr))
  ltso()
  soss(c0, cr, clt)
  fimaxg(s0, s1, clt, c0)
  3ad2ant1(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls), wi(wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))))
  reximdva(s0, c0, wss(c0, cr), wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))
  ralimdva(s1, c0, wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))
  anassrs(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wi(wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))
  biimprd(wa(wss(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))
  3bitr2d(wa(wss(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))
  leloed(cv(s1), cv(s0), wa(wss(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))))
  adantrl(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cr))
  ssel2(c0, cr, cv(s1))
  adantrr(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  ssel2(c0, cr, cv(s0))
  a1i(wa(wss(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wb(wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  bitri(wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  orcom(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))
  orbi2i(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  equcom(s0, s1)
  a1i(wa(wss(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wb(wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))))
  neor(cv(s0), cv(s1), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.wss.s(s1, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fimaxre(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c0 ≠ ∅)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  mpd((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c0 ≠ ∅), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]s0)), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ≠ s1 → s1[<]s0))))
  syl3an1(c0 ⊆ ℝ, c0 ∈ Fin, c0 ≠ ∅, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ≠ s1 → s1[<]s0))), < ≺ c0)
  mpi(c0 ⊆ ℝ, < ≺ c0, < ≺ ℝ)
  ltso()
  soss(c0, cr, clt)
  fimaxg(s0, s1, clt, c0)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ⊆ ℝ, c0 ∈ Fin, c0 ≠ ∅, (∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ≠ s1 → s1[<]s0)))→ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]s0))))
  reximdva(s0, c0, c0 ⊆ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ≠ s1 → s1[<]s0)), ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]s0))
  ralimdva(s1, c0, (c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ s0 ∈ c0), (s0 ≠ s1 → s1[<]s0), s1[≤]s0)
  anassrs(c0 ⊆ ℝ, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0, ((s0 ≠ s1 → s1[<]s0)→ s1[≤]s0))
  biimprd((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)), (s0 ≠ s1 → s1[<]s0), s1[≤]s0)
  3bitr2d((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)), s1[≤]s0, (s0 ≠ s1 → s1[<]s0), (s1[<]s0 ∨ s1 = s0), (s0 = s1 ∨ s1[<]s0))
  leloed(s1, s0, (c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)))
  adantrl(c0 ⊆ ℝ, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ ℝ)
  ssel2(c0, cr, s1)
  adantrr(c0 ⊆ ℝ, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ ℝ)
  ssel2(c0, cr, s0)
  a1i((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)), ((s0 = s1 ∨ s1[<]s0)↔(s1[<]s0 ∨ s1 = s0)))
  bitri((s0 = s1 ∨ s1[<]s0), (s1[<]s0 ∨ s1 = s0), (s1[<]s0 ∨ s0 = s1))
  orcom(s0 = s1, s1[<]s0)
  orbi2i(s1[<]s0, s0 = s1, s1 = s0)
  equcom(s0, s1)
  a1i((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)), ((s0 = s1 ∨ s1[<]s0)↔(s0 ≠ s1 → s1[<]s0)))
  neor(s0, s1, s1[<]s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 ⊆ ℝ, s0 ∈ c0)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm fimaxreOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

} = {
  mpd(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))))
  syl3an1(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))), wor(clt, c0))
  mpi(wss(c0, cr), wor(clt, c0), wor(clt, cr))
  ltso()
  soss(c0, cr, clt)
  fimaxg(s0, s1, clt, c0)
  3ad2ant1(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls), wi(wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))))
  reximdva(s0, c0, wss(c0, cr), wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))
  ralimdva(s1, c0, wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))
  anassrs(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wi(wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))
  syl(wa(wss(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wi(wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr)))
  imp(wss(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr)))
  anim12d(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr))
  ssel(c0, cr, cv(s0))
  ssel(c0, cr, cv(s1))
  biimprd(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))
  syl6bb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  ancoms(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wb(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  leloe(cv(s1), cv(s0))
  3bitri(wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))
  orbi2i(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))

  orcom(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  neor(cv(s0), cv(s1), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.wss.s(s1, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)

thm fimaxreOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c0 ≠ ∅)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  mpd((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c0 ≠ ∅), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]s0)), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ≠ s1 → s1[<]s0))))
  syl3an1(c0 ⊆ ℝ, c0 ∈ Fin, c0 ≠ ∅, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ≠ s1 → s1[<]s0))), < ≺ c0)
  mpi(c0 ⊆ ℝ, < ≺ c0, < ≺ ℝ)
  ltso()
  soss(c0, cr, clt)
  fimaxg(s0, s1, clt, c0)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ⊆ ℝ, c0 ∈ Fin, c0 ≠ ∅, (∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ≠ s1 → s1[<]s0)))→ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]s0))))
  reximdva(s0, c0, c0 ⊆ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ≠ s1 → s1[<]s0)), ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]s0))
  ralimdva(s1, c0, (c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ s0 ∈ c0), (s0 ≠ s1 → s1[<]s0), s1[≤]s0)
  anassrs(c0 ⊆ ℝ, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0, ((s0 ≠ s1 → s1[<]s0)→ s1[≤]s0))
  syl((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)), ((s0 ≠ s1 → s1[<]s0)→ s1[≤]s0), (s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ))
  imp(c0 ⊆ ℝ, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0), (s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ))
  anim12d(c0 ⊆ ℝ, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℝ)
  ssel(c0, cr, s0)
  ssel(c0, cr, s1)
  biimprd((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ), (s0 ≠ s1 → s1[<]s0), s1[≤]s0)
  syl6bb((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ), s1[≤]s0, (s0 ≠ s1 → s1[<]s0), (s1[<]s0 ∨ s1 = s0))
  ancoms(s0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℝ, (s1[≤]s0 ↔(s1[<]s0 ∨ s1 = s0)))
  leloe(s1, s0)
  3bitri((s1[<]s0 ∨ s1 = s0), (s0 ≠ s1 → s1[<]s0), (s1[<]s0 ∨ s0 = s1), (s0 = s1 ∨ s1[<]s0))
  orbi2i(s1[<]s0, s1 = s0, s0 = s1)
  equcom(s1, s0)
  orcom(s1[<]s0, s0 = s1)
  neor(s0, s1, s1[<]s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 ⊆ ℝ, s0 ∈ c0)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: fimaxre2
blocks.content: A nonempty finite set of real numbers has an upper bound. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 27-May-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fimaxre2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn)), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  pm2.61dne(c0, emptycls, wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn)), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  a1i(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn)), wi(wceq(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))))
  sylancr(wceq(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))), wcel(nat0, cr), wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, nat0)))
  0re()
  rzal(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, nat0))
  brralrspcev(s1, s0, nat0, cr, c0, cv(s1), cle)
  syld(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  3expia(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  fimaxre(s0, s1, c0)
  adantr(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wi(wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))))
  ssrexv(s0, c0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fimaxre2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ∈ Fin)→ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  pm2.61dne(c0, emptycls, (c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ∈ Fin), ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]s0)))
  a1i((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ∈ Fin), (c0 = ∅ → ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]s0))))
  sylancr(c0 = ∅, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]s0)), 0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]0))
  0re()
  rzal(s1, c0, s1[≤]0)
  brralrspcev(s1, s0, nat0, cr, c0, s1, cle)
  syld((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ∈ Fin), c0 ≠ ∅, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]s0)), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]s0)))
  3expia(c0 ⊆ ℝ, c0 ∈ Fin, c0 ≠ ∅, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]s0)))
  fimaxre(s0, s1, c0)
  adantr(c0 ⊆ ℝ, c0 ∈ Fin, (∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]s0))→ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]s0))))
  ssrexv(s0, c0, cr, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]s0))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fimaxre3
blocks.content: A nonempty finite set of real numbers has a maximum (image set version). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Feb-2014.)

thm fimaxre3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {

thm fimaxre3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℝ))→ ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  mpbid((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℝ)), ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s1)), ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ { hs1 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs1 = c1)}, hs0[≤]s1)))
  syl2anr(c0 ∈ Fin, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℝ), ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ { hs1 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs1 = c1)}, hs0[≤]s1)), { hs1 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs1 = c1)} ⊆ ℝ, { hs1 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs1 = c1)} ∈ Fin)
  abssdv(hs1, cr, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℝ), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs1 = c1))
  ex(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℝ), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs1 = c1), hs1 ∈ ℝ)
  syl((∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℝ)∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs1 = c1)), hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs1 = c1)))
  r19.29(s0, c0, c1 ∈ ℝ, hs1 = c1)
  rexlimivw(s0, c0, (c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs1 = c1), hs1 ∈ ℝ)
  biimparc(c1 ∈ ℝ, hs1 = c1, hs1 ∈ ℝ)
  eleq1(hs1, c1, cr)
  abrexfi(hs1, s0, c0, c1)
  fimaxre2(s1, hs0, { hs1 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs1 = c1)})
  adantl(c0 ∈ Fin, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℝ), (∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ { hs1 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs1 = c1)}, hs0[≤]s1))↔ ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s1))))
  rexbidv(s1, cr, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℝ), ∀(hs0 ∈ { hs1 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs1 = c1)}, hs0[≤]s1), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s1))
  syl5bbr(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℝ), ∀(hs0 ∈ { hs1 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs1 = c1)}, hs0[≤]s1), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s1), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0,(hs0 = c1 → hs0[≤]s1))))
  3bitr4i(∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0,(hs0 = c1 → hs0[≤]s1))), ∀(hs0 ∈ { hs1 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs1 = c1)}, hs0[≤]s1), ∀(hs0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 = c1 → hs0[≤]s1))), ∀(hs0,(∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1)→ hs0[≤]s1)))
  albii(hs0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 = c1 → hs0[≤]s1)), (∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1)→ hs0[≤]s1))
  r19.23v(s0, c0, hs0 = c1, hs0[≤]s1)
  ralcom4(s0, hs0, c0, (hs0 = c1 → hs0[≤]s1))
  ralab(hs0, hs1, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs1 = c1), hs0[≤]s1, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1))
  rexbidv(s0, c0, hs1 = hs0, hs1 = c1, hs0 = c1)
  eqeq1(hs1, hs0, c1)
  syl(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℝ), (∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0,(hs0 = c1 → hs0[≤]s1)))↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s1)), ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(∀(hs0,(hs0 = c1 → hs0[≤]s1))↔ c1[≤]s1)))
  ralimi(s0, c0, c1 ∈ ℝ, (∀(hs0,(hs0 = c1 → hs0[≤]s1))↔ c1[≤]s1))
  ceqsalg(hs0, c1, cr, hs0[≤]s1, c1[≤]s1)
  nfv(hs0, c1[≤]s1)
  breq1(hs0, c1, cle, s1)
  ralbi(s0, c0, ∀(hs0,(hs0 = c1 → hs0[≤]s1)), c1[≤]s1)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.w(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℝ))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs1, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)

  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cab.s(s1, hs1, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs1 = c1))
  diff.wrex.s(s1, s0, c0, hs1 = c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c({ hs1 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs1 = c1)})
  diff.wral.s(s1, s0, c0, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c1, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, hs0, cle, s1)
  diff.cle.s(s0)

  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c1[≤]s1)
}

blocks.name: fiminre
blocks.content: A nonempty finite set of real numbers has a minimum. Analogous to ~ fimaxre . (Contributed by AV, 9-Aug-2020.) (Proof shortened by Steven Nguyen, 3-Jun-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm fiminre(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  mpd(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))))))
  syl3an1(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))))), wor(clt, c0))
  mpi(wss(c0, cr), wor(clt, c0), wor(clt, cr))
  ltso()
  soss(c0, cr, clt)
  fiming(s0, s1, clt, c0)
  3ad2ant1(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls), wi(wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))))))
  reximdva(s0, c0, wss(c0, cr), wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))))
  ralimdva(s1, c0, wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)))
  biimprd(wa(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)))
  3bitr2d(wa(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))), wo(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))))
  leloed(cv(s0), cv(s1), wa(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
  adantr(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  ssel2(c0, cr, cv(s0))
  adantlr(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cr))
  ssel2(c0, cr, cv(s1))
  a1i(wa(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wb(wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))), wo(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  orcom(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))
  a1i(wa(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wb(wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))))
  neor(cv(s0), cv(s1), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.wss.s(s1, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fiminre(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c0 ≠ ∅)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s0[≤]s1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  mpd((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c0 ≠ ∅), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s0[≤]s1)), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ≠ s1 → s0[<]s1))))
  syl3an1(c0 ⊆ ℝ, c0 ∈ Fin, c0 ≠ ∅, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ≠ s1 → s0[<]s1))), < ≺ c0)
  mpi(c0 ⊆ ℝ, < ≺ c0, < ≺ ℝ)
  ltso()
  soss(c0, cr, clt)
  fiming(s0, s1, clt, c0)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ⊆ ℝ, c0 ∈ Fin, c0 ≠ ∅, (∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ≠ s1 → s0[<]s1)))→ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s0[≤]s1))))
  reximdva(s0, c0, c0 ⊆ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ≠ s1 → s0[<]s1)), ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s0[≤]s1))
  ralimdva(s1, c0, (c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ s0 ∈ c0), (s0 ≠ s1 → s0[<]s1), s0[≤]s1)
  biimprd(((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ s1 ∈ c0), (s0 ≠ s1 → s0[<]s1), s0[≤]s1)
  3bitr2d(((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ s1 ∈ c0), s0[≤]s1, (s0 ≠ s1 → s0[<]s1), (s0[<]s1 ∨ s0 = s1), (s0 = s1 ∨ s0[<]s1))
  leloed(s0, s1, ((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ s1 ∈ c0))
  adantr((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ s0 ∈ c0), s1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ ℝ)
  ssel2(c0, cr, s0)
  adantlr(c0 ⊆ ℝ, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ ℝ)
  ssel2(c0, cr, s1)
  a1i(((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ s1 ∈ c0), ((s0 = s1 ∨ s0[<]s1)↔(s0[<]s1 ∨ s0 = s1)))
  orcom(s0 = s1, s0[<]s1)
  a1i(((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ s1 ∈ c0), ((s0 = s1 ∨ s0[<]s1)↔(s0 ≠ s1 → s0[<]s1)))
  neor(s0, s1, s0[<]s1)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 ⊆ ℝ, s0 ∈ c0)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: negfi
blocks.content: The negation of a finite set of real numbers is finite. (Contributed by AV, 9-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm negfi(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn)), wcel(crab(s0, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), c0)), cfn))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  biimpa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(crab(s0, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), c0)), cfn))
  3bitrd(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(crab(s0, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), c0)), cfn), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0))), cfn), wcel(crn(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0)))), cfn))
  bitr4d(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0))), cfn), wcel(cdm(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0)))), cfn))
  eleq1d(c0, cfn, cdm(cmpt(hs0, c0, cneg(cv(hs0)))), wss(c0, cr))

thm negfi(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ∈ Fin)→ { s0 ∈ ℝ | -u(s0)∈ c0 } ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  biimpa(c0 ⊆ ℝ, c0 ∈ Fin, { s0 ∈ ℝ | -u(s0)∈ c0 } ∈ Fin)
  3bitrd(c0 ⊆ ℝ, c0 ∈ Fin, { s0 ∈ ℝ | -u(s0)∈ c0 } ∈ Fin, (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0))∈ Fin, ran((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0)))∈ Fin)
  bitr4d(c0 ⊆ ℝ, c0 ∈ Fin, (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0))∈ Fin, dom((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0)))∈ Fin)
  eleq1d(c0, cfn, dom((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0))), c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  eqcomd(c0, dom((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0))), c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  syl(c0 ⊆ ℝ, dom((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0)))= c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, -u(hs0)∈ ℝ))
  ralrimiv(hs0, c0, c0 ⊆ ℝ, -u(hs0)∈ ℝ)
  syl6(c0 ⊆ ℝ, hs0 ∈ c0, -u(hs0)∈ ℝ, hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  dmmptg(hs0, c0, -u(hs0), cr)
  mp1i(c0 ⊆ ℝ, ((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0))∈ Fin ↔ dom((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0)))∈ Fin), Fun((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0))))
  funmpt(hs0, c0, -u(hs0))
  fundmfibi((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0)))
  syl2anc(c0 ⊆ ℝ, ((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0))∈ Fin ↔ ran((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0)))∈ Fin), (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0))∈ 𝕌, ((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0)): c0 ↣ { hs1 ∈ ℝ | -u(hs1)∈ c0 }))
  mptexd(hs0, c0, -u(hs0), universe, c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  ssex(c0, cr)
  reex()
  syl(c0 ⊆ ℝ, ((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0)): c0 ↣ { hs1 ∈ ℝ | -u(hs1)∈ c0 }), ((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0)): c0 ↔ { hs1 ∈ ℝ | -u(hs1)∈ c0 }))
  negf1o(hs1, hs0, c0, (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0)))
  f1of1((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0)), c0, { hs1 ∈ ℝ | -u(hs1)∈ c0 })
  f1vrnfibi((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0)), universe, c0, { hs1 ∈ ℝ | -u(hs1)∈ c0 })
  eleq1d(ran((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0))), cfn, { s0 ∈ ℝ | -u(s0)∈ c0 }, c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  3eqtr4g(ran((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0))), { s0 ∈ ℝ | -u(s0)∈ c0 }, { s0 | ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, s0 = -u(hs0))}, { s0 |(s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ -u(s0)∈ c0)}, c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  abbidv(s0, c0 ⊆ ℝ, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, s0 = -u(hs0)), (s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ -u(s0)∈ c0))
  impbid(c0 ⊆ ℝ, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, s0 = -u(hs0)), (s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ -u(s0)∈ c0))
  rexlimdva(hs0, c0, c0 ⊆ ℝ, s0 = -u(hs0), (s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ -u(s0)∈ c0))
  syl5ibrcom((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), s0 = -u(hs0), (s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ -u(s0)∈ c0), (-u(hs0)∈ ℝ ∧ -u(-u(hs0))∈ c0))
  mpdan((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), (-u(hs0)∈ ℝ ∧ -u(-u(hs0))∈ c0), hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  imp(c0 ⊆ ℝ, hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  ssel(c0, cr, hs0)
  jca(((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ), -u(hs0)∈ ℝ, -u(-u(hs0))∈ c0)
  adantl((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), hs0 ∈ ℝ, -u(hs0)∈ ℝ)
  renegcl(hs0)
  imp((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), hs0 ∈ ℝ, -u(-u(hs0))∈ c0)
  adantl(c0 ⊆ ℝ, hs0 ∈ c0, (hs0 ∈ ℝ → -u(-u(hs0))∈ c0))
  biimpcd(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, -u(-u(hs0))∈ c0)
  eleq1d(hs0, c0, -u(-u(hs0)), hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  eqcomd(hs0, -u(-u(hs0)), hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  negnegd(hs0, hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  recn(hs0)
  anbi12d(s0 = -u(hs0), s0 ∈ ℝ, -u(s0)∈ c0, -u(hs0)∈ ℝ, -u(-u(hs0))∈ c0)
  eleq1(s0, -u(hs0), cr)
  eleq1d(-u(s0), c0, -u(-u(hs0)), s0 = -u(hs0))
  negeq(s0, -u(hs0))
  ex(c0 ⊆ ℝ, (s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ -u(s0)∈ c0), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, s0 = -u(hs0)))
  rspcedvd(hs0, c0, -u(s0), (c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ -u(s0)∈ c0)), s0 = -u(hs0), s0 = -u(-u(s0)))
  simprr(c0 ⊆ ℝ, s0 ∈ ℝ, -u(s0)∈ c0)
  adantl((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ -u(s0)∈ c0)), hs0 = -u(s0), (s0 = -u(hs0)↔ s0 = -u(-u(s0))))
  eqeq2d(s0, -u(hs0), -u(-u(s0)), hs0 = -u(s0))
  negeq(hs0, -u(s0))
  ad2antrl(c0 ⊆ ℝ, s0 ∈ ℝ, -u(s0)∈ c0, s0 = -u(-u(s0)))
  syl(s0 ∈ ℝ, s0 = -u(-u(s0)), s0 ∈ ℂ)
  recn(s0)
  eqcomd(s0, -u(-u(s0)), s0 ∈ ℂ)
  negneg(s0)
  rnmpt(s0, hs0, (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0)), c0, -u(hs0))
  eqid((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(hs0)))
  df-rab(s0, cr, -u(s0)∈ c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ -u(s0)∈ c0))
  diff.hs0.c(-u(s0))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ -u(s0)∈ c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(s0 = -u(-u(s0)))
  diff.cneg.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fiminreOLD
blocks.content: Obsolete version of ~ fiminre as of 3-Jun-2023. A nonempty finite set of real numbers has a minimum. Analogous to ~ fimaxre . (Contributed by AV, 9-Aug-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  mpd(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)))), wrex(hs1, crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), wral(hs0, crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)))))
  mp3an2i(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(hs1, crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), wral(hs0, crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)))), wss(crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), cr), wcel(crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), cfn), wne(crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), emptycls))
  ssrab2(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0))
  3adant3(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), cfn))
  negfi(hs2, c0)
  3adant2(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls), wne(crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), emptycls))
  negn0(hs2, c0)
  fimaxre(hs1, hs0, crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)))
  3ad2ant1(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls), wi(wrex(hs1, crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), wral(hs0, crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))))))
  rexlimdva(hs1, crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), wss(c0, cr), wral(hs0, crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)))))
  impcom(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(hs1), crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0))), wi(wral(hs0, crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))))))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(hs1), crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0))), wi(wss(c0, cr), wi(wral(hs0, crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cneg(cv(hs1)), c0)))
  elrab(hs2, cv(hs1), cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0), wcel(cneg(cv(hs1)), c0))
  eleq1d(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0, cneg(cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))
  negeq(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))
  exp31(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cneg(cv(hs1)), c0)), wss(c0, cr), wral(hs0, crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)))))
  rspcedvd(s0, c0, cneg(cv(hs1)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cneg(cv(hs1)), c0)), wss(c0, cr)), wral(hs0, crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)))), wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))), wral(s1, c0, wbr(cneg(cv(hs1)), cle, cv(s1))))

blocks.name: lbcl

blocks.name: sup3
blocks.content: A version of the completeness axiom for reals. (Contributed by NM, 12-Oct-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm sup3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, cr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  sylbi(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, cr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))))), w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  3bitr4i(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))), w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))), wa(wss(c0, cr), wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))), wa(wss(c0, cr), wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))))
  pm5.32i(wss(c0, cr), wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))), wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  anbi2d(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  rexbidva(s0, cr, wss(c0, cr), wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c0, wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  ralbidva(s1, c0, wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  imp31(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wb(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  syl9(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wb(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s1), cr))
  ssel(c0, cr, cv(s1))
  expcom(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wb(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  leloe(cv(s1), cv(s0))
  3anass(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  3anass(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))

  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cr)

blocks.name: infm3lem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ infm3 . (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm infm3lem(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wi(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wrex(s1, cr, wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  syl2anc(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wrex(s1, cr, wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cv(s1)))), wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), cr), wceq(cv(s0), cneg(cneg(cv(s0)))))
  renegcl(cv(s0))
  eqcomd(cv(s0), cneg(cneg(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  negnegd(cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  recn(cv(s0))
  rspceeqv(s1, cneg(cv(s0)), cr, cv(s0), cneg(cneg(cv(s0))), cneg(cv(s1)))
  negeq(cv(s1), cneg(cv(s0)))
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.cneg.s(s1, cneg(cv(s0)))
  diff.cneg.s(s1, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm infm3lem(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ ℝ → ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, s0 = -u(s1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  syl2anc(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, s0 = -u(s1)), -u(s0)∈ ℝ, s0 = -u(-u(s0)))
  renegcl(s0)
  eqcomd(s0, -u(-u(s0)), s0 ∈ ℝ)
  negnegd(s0, s0 ∈ ℝ)
  recn(s0)
  rspceeqv(s1, -u(s0), cr, s0, -u(-u(s0)), -u(s1))
  negeq(s1, -u(s0))
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.cneg.s(s1, -u(s0))
  diff.cneg.s(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: infm3
blocks.content: The completeness axiom for reals in terms of infimum: a nonempty, bounded-below set of reals has an infimum. (This theorem is the dual of ~ sup3 .) (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm infm3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))))), wrex(s0, cr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))))), wrex(s0, cr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1)))))))), diffss(s0, s2))
  3impib(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)))), wrex(s0, cr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1))))))))
  sylibrd(wss(c0, cr), wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))))), wrex(s0, cr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1))))))), wrex(hs0, cr, wa(wral(hs1, crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs3, crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs3))))))))
  syl6bi(wss(c0, cr), wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))))), wrex(hs0, cr, wa(wral(hs1, crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs3, crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs3))))))), wa(wne(crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), emptycls), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(hs1, crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, cv(hs0))))))
  anbi12d(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)))), wne(crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), emptycls), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(hs1, crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, cv(hs0)))))
  3bitr4g(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wne(crab(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)), emptycls), wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wrex(hs2, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs2)), c0)))

blocks.content: Closure of supremum of a nonempty bounded set of reals. (Contributed by NM, 12-Oct-2004.)

thm suprcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))), wcel(csup(c0, cr, clt), cr))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  supcl(s0, s1, hs0, c0, cr, clt, w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))))
  a1i(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))), wor(clt, cr))
  ltso()
  sup3(s0, s1, hs0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.clt.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(clt)
}

thm suprcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]s0)))→ sup(c0, ℝ, <)∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  supcl(s0, s1, hs0, c0, cr, clt, (c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]s0))))

  diff.hs0.w((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))

blocks.name: supadd
blocks.content: The supremum function distributes over addition in a sense similar to that in ~ supmul . (Contributed by Brendan Leahy, 26-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:

thm supadd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(sup(c0, ℝ, <)[+]sup(c1, ℝ, <))= sup(c2, ℝ, <))

  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ≠ ∅)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]s0)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ≠ ∅)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, s1[≤]s0)))
  ⊣ c2 = { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ c0, ∃(s4 ∈ c1, s2 =(s3[+]s4)))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
  ⊣ d(s4, c0)
  ⊣ d(s4, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
  ⊣ d(s3, w0)
  ⊣ d(s4, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(sup(c0, ℝ, <)[+]sup(c1, ℝ, <))= sup(c2, ℝ, <)), d(s0, s3))
  a1ii((w0 →(sup(c0, ℝ, <)[+]sup(c1, ℝ, <))= sup(c2, ℝ, <)), d(s1, s3))
  a1ii((w0 →(sup(c0, ℝ, <)[+]sup(c1, ℝ, <))= sup(c2, ℝ, <)), d(s3, w0))

blocks.name: supmul1
blocks.content: The supremum function distributes over multiplication, in the sense that ` A x. ( sup B ) = sup ( A x. B ) ` , where ` A x. B ` is shorthand for ` { A x. b | b e. B } ` and is defined as ` C ` below. This is the simple version, with only one set argument; see ~ supmul for the more general case with two set arguments. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jul-2013.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: supmul
blocks.content: The supremum function distributes over multiplication, in the sense that ` ( sup A ) x. ( sup B ) = sup ( A x. B ) ` , where ` A x. B ` is shorthand for ` { a x. b | a e. A , b e. B } ` and is defined as ` C ` below. We made use of this in our definition of multiplication in the Dedekind cut construction of the reals (see ~ df-mp ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jul-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: sup3ii
blocks.content: A version of the completeness axiom for reals. (Contributed by NM, 23-Aug-1999.)

blocks.name: suprclii
blocks.content: Closure of supremum of a nonempty bounded set of reals. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-1999.)

blocks.name: suprubii
blocks.content: A member of a nonempty bounded set of reals is less than or equal to the set's upper bound. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-1999.)

blocks.name: suprlubii
blocks.content: The supremum of a nonempty bounded set of reals is the least upper bound. (Contributed by NM, 15-Oct-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm suprlubii(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wbr(c0, clt, csup(c1, cr, clt)), wrex(s0, c1, wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)))))
  -| w3a(wss(c1, cr), wne(c1, emptycls), wrex(s1, cr, wral(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wbr(c0, clt, csup(c1, cr, clt)), wrex(s0, c1, wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0))))), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wbr(c0, clt, csup(c1, cr, clt)), wrex(s0, c1, wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0))))), diffss(s0, s2))
  mpan(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wbr(c0, clt, csup(c1, cr, clt)), wrex(s0, c1, wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)))), w3a(wss(c1, cr), wne(c1, emptycls), wrex(s1, cr, wral(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(s1))))))
  suprlub(s1, s2, s0, c1, c0)
}

blocks.name: suprnubii
blocks.content: An upper bound is not less than the supremum of a nonempty bounded set of reals. (Contributed by NM, 15-Oct-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm suprnubii(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wn(wbr(c0, clt, csup(c1, cr, clt))), wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0))))))
  -| w3a(wss(c1, cr), wne(c1, emptycls), wrex(s1, cr, wral(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wn(wbr(c0, clt, csup(c1, cr, clt))), wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)))))), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wn(wbr(c0, clt, csup(c1, cr, clt))), wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)))))), diffss(s0, s2))

thm infrecl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s0[≤]s1)))→ inf(c0, ℝ, <)∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  infcl(s0, s1, hs0, c0, cr, clt, (c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s0[≤]s1))))
  a1i((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s0[≤]s1))), < ≺ ℝ)
  ltso()
  infm3(s0, s1, hs0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.clt.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(clt)
}

blocks.name: infrenegsup
blocks.content: The infimum of a set of reals ` A ` is the negative of the supremum of the negatives of its elements. The antecedent ensures that ` A ` is nonempty and has a lower bound. (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2005.) (Revised by AV, 4-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: supfirege
blocks.content: The supremum of a finite set of real numbers is greater than or equal to all the real numbers of the set. (Contributed by AV, 1-Oct-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm supfirege(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, csup(c2, cr, clt)))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wo(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(c0, c1)))
  supgtoreq(c0, clt, c1, cr, c2, w0)
  leloed(c0, c1, w0)
  sseldd(c0, cr, c2, w0)
  sseldd(c1, cr, c2, w0)
  eqeltrd(c1, c2, csup(c2, cr, clt), w0)
  syl13anc(w0, wcel(csup(c2, cr, clt), c2), wor(clt, cr), wcel(c2, cfn), wne(c2, emptycls), wss(c2, cr))
  a1i(w0, wor(clt, cr))
  ltso()
  ne0d(c2, c0, w0)
  fisupcl(clt, cr, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm supfirege(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[≤]c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 = sup(c2, ℝ, <))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0[≤]c1, (c0[<]c1 ∨ c0 = c1))
  supgtoreq(c0, clt, c1, cr, c2, w0)
  leloed(c0, c1, w0)
  sseldd(c0, cr, c2, w0)
  sseldd(c1, cr, c2, w0)
  eqeltrd(c1, c2, sup(c2, ℝ, <), w0)
  syl13anc(w0, sup(c2, ℝ, <)∈ c2, < ≺ ℝ, c2 ∈ Fin, c2 ≠ ∅, c2 ⊆ ℝ)
  a1i(w0, < ≺ ℝ)
  ltso()
  ne0d(c2, c0, w0)
  fisupcl(clt, cr, c2)
}
